name: Idle Cruise Ship
description:
Build and manage a fleet of cruise ships, Sail them around the world and collect the profits!

Play the NEW idle manager game that's taking the 7 seas by storm!
- Manage your crew on the greatest cruise ship in the world
- Collect the profits as your satisfied clients sit back, relax, and enjoy their cruise ship experience
- Strategically place your crew, entertainment, and other resources in order to maximize profits
- A true idle game experience - Get profits, even when your offline!
- Buy new amazing cruise ships, unlock new tropical destinations and win amazing rewards.
- Collect expert cards and assign them to your ship decks in order to earn even more!

Put your business management skills to the test in the IDLE CRUISE SHIP - the most challenging idle tycoon game yet!

Are you ready to test your cruise ship management skills and become the richest cruise ship tycoon in the world?
